author: @vigneshallam
text: I think the instead of keyup or keydown U could use pygame.key.get_pressed()

author: @lonelyapples5744
text: An easier way for smooth controls:   def control_check():  keys_pressed = pygame.key.get_pressed()   if keys_pressed[pygame.K_w]:   glTranslatef(0.0, -0.1, 0.0)   if keys_pressed[pygame.K_s]:   glTranslatef(0.0, 0.1, 0.0)   if keys_pressed[pygame.K_d]:   glTranslatef(-0.1, 0.0, 0.0)   if keys_pressed[pygame.K_a]:   glTranslatef(0.1, 0.0, 0.0)
